record.title: GREETINGS TO THE PRESIDING OFFICER
record.narrative:
GREETINGS TO THE PRESIDING OFFICER -- (Senate - September 04, 2007)

[Page: S11005]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, at the outset, permit me to greet the distinguished Presiding Officer, Senator Casey, my colleague from Pennsylvania. It is a pleasure to come back after the August break and see Senator Casey looking so well and fit and in the chair.
